description:
A classic hoodie, wearing Patgonia’s classic logo. Made entirely from recycled materials, the P-6 Uprisal Hoodie warms you inside and out.

  • Made from recycled bottles and scrap fabrics, using less water and helping keep scraps out of the world's landfills and incinerators
  • Ribbed side panels let the shirt move with you
  • Ribbed collar, cuffs, and hem help keep the warm in and the cold out
  • Screen-print inks are PVC- and phthalate-free
  • Fair Trade Certified™ sewn
  • Regular fit wears like an old favourite
name: Patagonia P-6 Logo Uprisal Hoodie - Unisex
